channel.title: sctp on 杂七杂八随手记
channel.description: Recent content in sctp on 杂七杂八随手记

item.title: Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP)
item.description: Table of Contents 1 SCTP Associations 2 Using Multiple Interfaces 3 Streams 4 Association ID 5 Rec & Send 6 CDB with SCTP? 7 SCTP Interface Model 7.1 two types of SCTP sockets 7.2 The One-to-One Style 7.3 The One-to-Many Style 1 SCTP Associations SCTP 的联合 (association) 类似于 TCP 的连接 (connection) ， 但又有不同： TCP connection 在服务端
